ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_TRANSACTION_DATE_TIME
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Maximum allowed date range to search
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Maximum allowed date range to search in Back Office (in days)

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_SEARCH_RESULT_TYPE
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Number of search records to be displayed in each page.
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Number of search records to be displayed in each page

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_TRANSACTION_DATE_TIME_REG
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Maximum allowed date range to search
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Maximum allowed date range to search in Register(in days)

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_MAX_RECORD_SEARCH_REG
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Maximum limit for number of search results returned for REG.
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Maximum limit for number of search results returned for REG

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_MAX_RECORD_SEARCH_EC
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Maximum limit for number of search results returned for EC.
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Maximum limit for number of search results returned for EC

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_MAX_RECORD_SEARCH
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Maximum limit for number of search results returned for BO.
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Maximum limit for number of search results returned for BO
